title: Senator Lieberman Advises Against Any Business With Iran(Audio)
itunes:title: Senator Lieberman Advises Against Any Business With Iran(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Former Senator Joe Lieberman, Chairman of UANI-United Against Nuclear Iran, discusses why his organization is warning companies that re-entering the Iranian market is risky business.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
